net.dragondelve.customdriversutil.gui

Class NewGridWizardController

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.dragondelve.customdriversutil.gui.NewGridWizardController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StageController

    public class NewGridWizardController
extends java.lang.Object
implements StageController
    New Grid Wizard controller controls the fxml/NewGridWizard.fxml NewGridWizard allows the user to create a new Grid or to generate a new grid using the GridGenerator.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private javafx.scene.control.TextField amountTextField
      TextField that displays and allows user to edit the nDrivers property of GeneratorSettings that will be passed to the GridGenerator.
      private javafx.scene.control.CheckBox bindQualiCheckBox
      CheckBox that determines if the raceskill and qualiSkill properties of every Driver in the grid should be bound instead of being generated independently.
      private javafx.scene.control.RadioButton blankNamesRadioButton
      Radio button that determines if the generated grid is going to use blank names as a source.
      private javafx.scene.control.CheckBox emptyGridCheckBox
      CheckBox that determines if the user wants to start with a blank grid.
      private javafx.scene.control.CheckBox forEachLiveryCheckBox
      CheckBox that determines if the amount of drivers generated is going to be equal to how many liveries there are in the class.
      private javafx.scene.control.RadioButton fromLiveryNamesRadioButton
      RadioButton that determines if drivers in the generated grid should have generated names based on their livery name.
      private javafx.scene.control.Button generateButton
      Button that erforms generateAction() on action.
      private javafx.scene.control.CheckBox generateGridCheckBox
      CheckBox that determines if the user wants a grid to be generated using GridGenerator.
      private javafx.scene.layout.GridPane generateGridPane
      Pane that contains the settings for grid generation.
      private GeneratorSettings generatorSettings
      Generator settings that are passed to the grid generator if the user wants to generate a new grid.
      private javafx.scene.control.RadioButton highNoiseRadioButton
      Radio button that determines if high noise should be used when generating values for a grid when using rangeValueGenerator.
      private javafx.scene.control.CheckBox limitAggressionCheckBox
      CheckBox that determines if aggression should be limited to a particular value set by the limitToTextField.
      private javafx.scene.control.TextField limitToTextField
      TextField that displays and allows the user to edit the aggressionLimit property that determines tha maximum value that each driver's aggression property can have.
      private javafx.scene.control.RadioButton lowNoiseRadioButton
      Radio button that determines if low noise should be used when generating values for a grid when using rangeValueGenerator.
      private javafx.beans.property.DoubleProperty maxValue
      Maximum value of all driver properties to be used in generating the new Grid.
      private javafx.scene.control.TextField maxValueTextField
      TextField that displays and allows the user to edit the values of maxValue doubleProperty.
      private javafx.beans.property.DoubleProperty minValue
      Minimum value of all driver properties to be used in generating the new Grid.
      private javafx.scene.control.TextField minValueTextField
      TextField that displays and allows the user to edit the values of minValue doubleProperty.
      private javafx.scene.control.Label namesNoticeLabel
      Label that displays the notice for NAMeS files if useNAMeS radioButton is selected.
      private javafx.scene.control.RadioButton noNoiseRadioButton
      Radio button that determines if noNoise should be used when generating values for a grid when using rangeValueGenerator.
      private javafx.scene.control.CheckBox noValuesCheckBox
      CheckBox that determines if no values should be set to the grid when generating it.
      private javafx.scene.control.CheckBox qualiExceedsRaceSkillCheckBox
      CheckBox that determines if QualiSkill should exceed raceSkill if those values are bound.
      private javafx.scene.control.TextField qualiExceedsTextField
      TextField that determines by how much the quali skill will exceed race skill if those values are bound.
      private javafx.scene.control.RadioButton randomAllRadioButton
      RadioButton that determines if all properties of generated drivers are going to be provided with RandomValueGenerator.
      private javafx.scene.control.RadioButton randomSkillRadioButton
      RadioButton that determines if RandomValueGenerator should be only determinning the race skill of all drivers generated by this item.
      private javafx.scene.control.CheckBox randomValuesCheckBox
      CheckBox that determines if the RandomValuesGenerator is going to be used to generate the values of the new grid.
      private javafx.scene.control.CheckBox rangeOfValuesCheckBox
      CheckBox that determines if RangeValueGenerator should be used to generate values for the generated grid.
      private javafx.scene.control.CheckBox reduceGapOnOvalsCheckBox
      CheckBox that determines if the GridGenerator will generate trackOverrides for ovals, reducing the gap in race skill and quali skill in half.
      private javafx.scene.layout.VBox rootPane
      The root pane of this window, used to apply the CSS resource to this entire scene.
      private javafx.stage.Stage stage
      Stage on which this StageController is going to be displayed.
      private javafx.scene.control.RadioButton useNAMeSRadioButton
      RadioButton that determines if drivers in the generated grid should have names borrowed from NAMeS resources if such resources are available for this VehicleClass..
      private javafx.scene.control.ChoiceBox<VehicleClass> vehicleClassChoiceBox
      choiceBox that determines what vehicleClass is going to be used when generating a new grid.

      • reduceGapOnOvalsCheckBox

        private javafx.scene.control.CheckBox reduceGapOnOvalsCheckBox
        CheckBox that determines if the GridGenerator will generate trackOverrides for ovals, reducing the gap in race skill and quali skill in half.

      • bindQualiCheckBox

        private javafx.scene.control.CheckBox bindQualiCheckBox
        CheckBox that determines if the raceskill and qualiSkill properties of every Driver in the grid should be bound instead of being generated independently.

      • limitAggressionCheckBox

        private javafx.scene.control.CheckBox limitAggressionCheckBox
        CheckBox that determines if aggression should be limited to a particular value set by the limitToTextField.

      • limitToTextField

        private javafx.scene.control.TextField limitToTextField
        TextField that displays and allows the user to edit the aggressionLimit property that determines tha maximum value that each driver's aggression property can have.

      • noValuesCheckBox

        private javafx.scene.control.CheckBox noValuesCheckBox
        CheckBox that determines if no values should be set to the grid when generating it.

      • maxValueTextField

        private javafx.scene.control.TextField maxValueTextField
        TextField that displays and allows the user to edit the values of maxValue doubleProperty. maxValue determines the max value that can be set on any property.

      • generateGridCheckBox

        private javafx.scene.control.CheckBox generateGridCheckBox
        CheckBox that determines if the user wants a grid to be generated using GridGenerator.

      • rootPane

        private javafx.scene.layout.VBox rootPane
        The root pane of this window, used to apply the CSS resource to this entire scene.

      • randomValuesCheckBox

        private javafx.scene.control.CheckBox randomValuesCheckBox
        CheckBox that determines if the RandomValuesGenerator is going to be used to generate the values of the new grid.

      • qualiExceedsTextField

        private javafx.scene.control.TextField qualiExceedsTextField
        TextField that determines by how much the quali skill will exceed race skill if those values are bound.

      • randomAllRadioButton

        private javafx.scene.control.RadioButton randomAllRadioButton
        RadioButton that determines if all properties of generated drivers are going to be provided with RandomValueGenerator.

      • forEachLiveryCheckBox

        private javafx.scene.control.CheckBox forEachLiveryCheckBox
        CheckBox that determines if the amount of drivers generated is going to be equal to how many liveries there are in the class.

      • fromLiveryNamesRadioButton

        private javafx.scene.control.RadioButton fromLiveryNamesRadioButton
        RadioButton that determines if drivers in the generated grid should have generated names based on their livery name.

      • rangeOfValuesCheckBox

        private javafx.scene.control.CheckBox rangeOfValuesCheckBox
        CheckBox that determines if RangeValueGenerator should be used to generate values for the generated grid.

      • minValueTextField

        private javafx.scene.control.TextField minValueTextField
        TextField that displays and allows the user to edit the values of minValue doubleProperty. maxValue determines the minimum value that can be set on any property.

      • highNoiseRadioButton

        private javafx.scene.control.RadioButton highNoiseRadioButton
        Radio button that determines if high noise should be used when generating values for a grid when using rangeValueGenerator.

      • useNAMeSRadioButton

        private javafx.scene.control.RadioButton useNAMeSRadioButton
        RadioButton that determines if drivers in the generated grid should have names borrowed from NAMeS resources if such resources are available for this VehicleClass..

      • randomSkillRadioButton

        private javafx.scene.control.RadioButton randomSkillRadioButton
        RadioButton that determines if RandomValueGenerator should be only determinning the race skill of all drivers generated by this item.

      • lowNoiseRadioButton

        private javafx.scene.control.RadioButton lowNoiseRadioButton
        Radio button that determines if low noise should be used when generating values for a grid when using rangeValueGenerator.

      • amountTextField

        private javafx.scene.control.TextField amountTextField
        TextField that displays and allows user to edit the nDrivers property of GeneratorSettings that will be passed to the GridGenerator. This value only matters if forEachLiveryCheckBox is not selecteed.

      • generateGridPane

        private javafx.scene.layout.GridPane generateGridPane
        Pane that contains the settings for grid generation. Used for disabling all generator settings if empty grid is selected by the user.

      • namesNoticeLabel

        private javafx.scene.control.Label namesNoticeLabel
        Label that displays the notice for NAMeS files if useNAMeS radioButton is selected.

      • stage

        private javafx.stage.Stage stage
        Stage on which this StageController is going to be displayed.

      • minValue

        private final javafx.beans.property.DoubleProperty minValue
        Minimum value of all driver properties to be used in generating the new Grid.

      • maxValue

        private final javafx.beans.property.DoubleProperty maxValue
        Maximum value of all driver properties to be used in generating the new Grid.

      • generatorSettings

        private final GeneratorSettings generatorSettings
        Generator settings that are passed to the grid generator if the user wants to generate a new grid.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Initialize method initializes all the visual elements before they are displayed by the user. initialize method is called automatically by JavaFX when this editor is being loaded from XML.

      • setStage

        public void setStage(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
        Lightweight mutator method.
        Specified by:
        setStage in interface StageController
        Parameters:
        stage - Stage on which this controller is going to be displayed.

      • generateAction

        private void generateAction()
        Performed by the GenerateButton. Uses the currently set GeneratorSettings to generate a new grid and advance to the main window passing that grid to the controller of the main window.

      • loadMainWindow

        private void loadMainWindow(Grid generatorGrid)
        Loads the main window and sets the provided grid as the edited grid in the main window.
        Parameters:
        generatorGrid - Grid generated by the GridGenerator or a new empty grid if the user wants to start with an empty grid.
